markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knight's Maintenance Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1554)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 86</row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This set of gear contains a repair kit, cloth rolls for storing or covering equipment, and specialized mixtures developed by the Knights of Lastwall to clean and treat armaments for continued use. This kit gives you a +1 item bonus to checks to [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) weapons, shields, and armor using the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and you restore an additional 5 Hit Points when you successfully Repair such items using it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
